title: Was the Republic of Okasio-Cortiz 'afraid' of disposing of garbage?
subtitle: An environmental office in New York City once estimated that "less than 1% of the city's households" had such discharges.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: ==History==Askandria Okasio Cortez of the United States published a video of herself "fearing" in discovering the disposal of garbage in her apartment.
